entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Norman Wells
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -33.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Norman Wells Airport 1:48 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -33.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -36.6°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
